named-query.name: getAllTasksEvents
named-query.query: select t from TaskEventImpl t where t.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getAllUserTasks
named-query.query: select u from AuditTaskUserImpl u where u.actualOwner = :userId order by u.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllUserTasksByStatus
named-query.query: select u from AuditTaskUserImpl u where u.actualOwner = :userId and u.status = :status order by u.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllUserTasksByDueDate
named-query.query: select u from AuditTaskUserImpl u where u.actualOwner = :userId and u.dueDate = :dueDate order by u.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllUserTasksByStatusByDueDate
named-query.query: select u from AuditTaskUserImpl u where u.actualOwner = :userId and u.status = :status and u.dueDate = :dueDate order by u.taskId DESC

named-query.name: getAllUserTasksByStatusByDueDateOptional
named-query.query: select u from AuditTaskUserImpl u where u.actualOwner = :userId and u.status = :status and (u.dueDate = :dueDate or u.dueDate = null) order by u.taskId DESC
